Package arcade.potts.env.location

Class PottsLocations

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.potts.env.location.PottsLocation
      • arcade.potts.env.location.PottsLocations
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Location
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PottsLocations2D, PottsLocations3D
    public abstract class PottsLocations
extends PottsLocation
    Abstract extension of PottsLocation for regions.

    PottsLocations objects manage an additional map of region to PottsLocation objects that manages the specific subsets of voxels for each region.

    Concrete implementations of PottsLocations manage the dimensionality of the voxels.

    PottsLocations also provides several additional general static methods for manipulating voxel lists needed for regions:

    • Assign voxels in lists to regions
    • Select voxels to assign based on distance

      • separateVoxels

        Location separateVoxels​(java.util.ArrayList<Voxel> voxelsA,
                        java.util.ArrayList<Voxel> voxelsB,
                        ec.util.MersenneTwisterFast random)
        Separates voxels in the list between this location and a new location.

        Regions are re-assigned between the two splits.

        Overrides:
        separateVoxels in class PottsLocation
        Parameters:
        voxelsA - the list of voxels for this location
        voxelsB - the list of voxels for the split location
        random - the seeded random number generator
        Returns:
        a Location object with split voxels
